abstract: The chairman of Royal Bank of Scotland called for an end to “public flogging.”
snippet: The chairman of Royal Bank of Scotland called for an end to “public flogging.”
lead_paragraph: LONDON  The chairman of Royal Bank of Scotland, whose record loss and near collapse made it a symbol of the financial crisis in Britain, called for an end to “public flogging” for past mistakes.

headline.main: Investors Asked to Stop Focusing on Bank’s Mistakes
headline.print_headline: A Bank Chairman Says ‘Public Flogging’ Must End
